name: Dumb Baby
description:
Description:

Protect the damn baby!! The baby's parents has left for vacation and are counting on you to watch over the baby! You find out there's little Rascals attempting to mess with the baby's limbs and you only have a toy gun as your only weapon. Protect the baby while also making sure it doesn't starve to death.

How To Play:

Use the WASD keys to move. Left-click to shoot bullets.

Collect milk bottles to increase the baby's fullness meter.
Pick up blue bullets to use as your ammo.

The happiness meter decreases when at least one of the baby's limbs are not in correct rotation. When near the baby, you can press E to rotate one of the baby's incorrectly rotated limbs 90 degrees clockwise. You'll know all the baby's limbs are in correct rotation when the happiness meter does not go down.

Press R at any time to restart the game.

Win condition: Survive for 60 seconds without the happiness or fullness meter reaching 0.

Lose condition: Either the happiness or fullness meter reaches 0.


Game background:

This game was made for the SH!TPOST Game Jam by UNSW GDS 2021T3 (https://itch.io/jam/unswgdsgamejam1). Check out the other submissions!

The game was made in approximately 2 days and 7 hours.

Software used:

This game was made using the following software:

  • Unity3D
  • GIMP 2.0
  • Paint
  • Audacity


Credits:

All code and sprites have been created by ExcaliburLily (me).

This game uses the following sound from freesound:

"Baby singing II" by renatofarabeuf (https://freesound.org/people/renatofarabeuf/sounds/455604/) licensed under CCBYNC 3.0

  • Parts of the sound was cut out
  • The sound's pitch was modified to suit gameplay mechanic
